time_markers.text: since standing down as prime minister in 2010
quotes: In December 2015, Brown took his first large-scale role in the private sector since standing down as prime minister in 2010, becoming an advisor to PIMCO.
On 7 November 2017, Brown released his memoir My Life, Our Times.
In September 2020, Brown was a co-author of a letter to the journal Nature highlighting the importance of EU funding in the fight against COVID-19.
On 10 June 2021, Brown released the book Seven Ways to Change the World: How To Fix The Most Pressing Problems We Face.
In September 2021, Brown was appointed by the World Health Organization as Goodwill Ambassador for Global Health Financing.

On 5 December 2022, having led development of a Labour party blueprint on constitutional reform, Brown announced the publication of these proposals alongside future Labour prime minister Keir Starmer.
